title: The World Order of Bahá’u’lláh: Selected Letters
description: A compilation of Shoghi Effendi's letters. Shoghi Effendi was considered the Guardian of the Baha'i Faith, and he was the great-grandson of the Prophet/Founder of the Baha'i Faith, Baha'u'llah. These letters are a powerful gathering of instruction, inspiration, and prophecy regarding living within the Administrative Order of the Baha'i Faith.
author: Shoghi Effendi
